user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill my need for high-quality, comfortable clothing that suits my lifestyle and can withstand daily wear.
purchase_reason: I was looking for durable and comfortable apparel that aligns with my active lifestyle. The product's quality and authentic western style appealed to me, and I appreciated the fast shipping and overall satisfaction with the purchase experience.

I needed a versatile pair of jeans that could be worn for both casual and slightly dressier occasions. The product's quality and the brand's reputation for comfort and durability were significant factors in my decision, along with the positive experience of timely delivery.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer a combination of comfort, durability, and quality. I value items that are designed with attention to detail, ensuring they are not only functional but also comfortable for everyday use. Features such as moisture-wicking fabrics, breathable materials, and supportive designs are particularly appealing to me. Additionally, I appreciate brands that prioritize sustainability and corporate responsibility. On the other hand, I tend to dislike products that lack quality, are uncomfortable, or do not provide good value for money. I also find it unappealing when items do not meet the promised standards of durability or comfort.
